description:
InvalidInput: Invalid input received: vif type bridge not supported

Gives an error while launching and instance and the code is not updated in openstack newton when using linux bridge as mechanism driver instead or OVS or DVS
The code needs to fixed.
There are minor changes in vif.py file.
title: VMware vSphere in Configuration Reference: InvalidInput: Invalid input received: vif type bridge not supported

comments.content: This is a documentation bug, do you mean the vif.py file in one of the OpenStack projects needs to be changed? Do you mean "neutron" instead of "newton?"

comments.content: There are no currently open reviews on this bug, changing the status back to the previous state and unassigning. If there are active reviews related to this bug, please include links in comments.
